::Aelo/Celeno/Ocipite/Sharpclaws/Darkfate::

Aelo's, Celeno's and Ocipite's eyes could see Scorponok's and 
Sharpclaws's arrival and they used their comm link.
 
Aelo: Darkfate
Celeno: Sharpclaws arrived and with him our new member of our crew 
Scorponok...
Ocipite: They soon will be fighting with us against that Rebels...

**********

Darkfate::

"Great.." said pleased the leader and used his com link "Sharpclaws, 
come quickly with Scorponok -Perceptor and we will cover you... LOOK 
OUT!!!" 

*******
Sharpclaws::

"Hold on Scorponok" said the male afther he heard Darkfate's 
command "Darkfate wants that we go with him and we have to run -It 
will be fast"









--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> "Thanks, You wont regret it" says Scorponok cheerfully. "How much 
longer to
> battle, I'm itching to duke it out"
